participant_1.background:
I listen to the Beatles every morning before work to start my day off on the right foot.
i love cooking.
i am allergic to milk.
I practice yoga and meditation to keep fit and calm my mind.
I can't wait to get home and tend to my greenhouse after the concert tonight.

participant_2.background:
I come from a small town in the Midwest, where I grew up fishing and learning about animals.
i got married to my highschool friend.
i am a lesbian.
I enjoy trying new ethnic foods with my friends from out of town.
i still love to line dry my clothes.

content.text: Hi there! I'm so glad you're here! What brings you to the chat tonight?
Hello! I'm here to meet new people and learn about different cultures.
That's great! I'm a big fan of learning about new cultures too. I'm from the Midwest, where I grew up fishing and learning about animals.
That's awesome! I love the outdoors too. I'm actually a lesbian and I got married to my highschool friend.
That's wonderful! I'm so happy for you! What kinds of things do you enjoy doing together?
We love trying new ethnic foods and exploring new places. We also love to line dry our clothes.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to cook too. I love listening to the Beatles every morning before work to start my day off on the right foot.
That's awesome! I love the Beatles too! I also practice yoga and meditation to keep fit and calm my mind.
That's great! I'm glad you're doing something to take care of yourself. I can't wait to get home and tend to my greenhouse after the concert tonight.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love plants. I have a small garden at home that I love to work in.
That's awesome! I wish I had a garden at home. I'm excited to hear more about your life!
